dcterms:description: CodRED is the first open source human-annotated cross-document relation extraction dataset, which serves as a starting point to solve CrossDocRE. It contains documents with identified source and target entities, and various text paths between these entities are recognized using mentioned entities.
dcterms:title: CodRED
